text: Montenegro competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Montenegro entered three swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Ado Gargović |align=left|50 m backstroke |28.27 |60 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m backstroke |1:01.37 |59 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Boško Radulović |align=left|50 m freestyle |24.21 |=79 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m butterfly |25.11 |56 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font- size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Anđela Antunović |align=left|100 m freestyle |1:01.38 |72 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|200 m freestyle |2:13.62 |50 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==Water polo== ===Men's tournament=== ;Team roster *Dejan Lazović *Draško Brguljan (C) *Đuro Radović *Marko Petković *Uroš Čučković *Aleksa Ukropina *Mlađan Janović *Bogdan Đurđić *Aleksandar Ivović *Vladan Spaić *Dragan Drašković *Nikola Murišić *Slaven Kandić *Coach: Vladimir Gojković ;Group A \---- \---- ;Playoffs ;9th–12th place semifinals ;Ninth place game ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Montenegro at the World Aquatics Championships Category:2019 in Montenegrin sport
title: Montenegro at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
